meanings.definition: Resembling a raven in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The dark, ravenlike feathers of the bird stood out against the bright sky.
meanings.sent2: Her ravenlike hair cascaded down her back in a sleek, glossy wave.
meanings.sent3: The ravenlike crow cawed loudly, demanding attention from the other birds.
meanings.sent4: His piercing gaze was ravenlike, capturing every detail in the room.
meanings.sent5: The eerie, ravenlike silhouette perched on the tree branch, watching the world below.
